name: Environmental Impact of Inhalers
title: MDIs prescribed as a proprotion of all inhalers
description: MDIs prescribed as a proprotion of all inhalers in BNF Chapter 3
why_it_matters: The NHS 10 year plan comits the NHS to reduce harmful environmental emissions. One way of doing this is to shift from
Metered Dose Inhalers (MDI) to Dry Powdered Inhalers (DPI).
